response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,080,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a high-quality product at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1080000}
